section.name: News
section.p: Version 0.3 has been released, as of 2003-02-14. The following features were added:

ul.li: Implemented a protocol system for the simple-jndi root's location. The original file location was retrofitted into this and a classpath location was added. A http location is planned
If a protocol is unspecified, then resort to v0.2 format, ie) file://
If root is unspecified, then use the classpath
The delimiter in the search values is configurable, so people can more easily mimic LDAP
